name: Ian's Head Bumper
description:
Enjoy this pong game with our favorite classmate, Ian's, head as the ball.

The first side to get 15 points wins.

Control

left: 'w' to go up, 's' to go down

right: 'up arrow' to go up, 'down arrow' to go down

Credits

Programming: SophieAn

Graphics design: Yvonne

Sound & image of head: Ian & Sean
